coloured.translation[0].definitions[0].d: having a colour other than black or white
coloured.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a very offensive word used to describe someone who is a member of a race of people with dark or black skin. Do not use this word.
coloured.translation[0].definitions[2].d: used in South Africa to describe someone whose parents or grandparents were not of the same race as each other
